quotes.quote: There's always some amount of gradual, slow burning destruction over the course of partying.
Never be the first to arrive at a party or the last to go home, and never, ever be both.
No party is any fun unless seasoned with folly.
Nothing makes you more tolerant of a neighbor's noisy party than being there.
Life may not be the party we hoped for, but while we're here we should dance.
When you're out there partying, horsing around, someone out there at the same time is working hard. Someone is getting smarter and someone is winning. Just remember that.
At every party there are two kinds of people -- those who want to go home and those who don't. The trouble is, they are usually married to each other.
When you work hard...it's only fair that you party hard.
Enjoy your life...let loose, party hard and just have a good time.
Party like there is no tomorrow!
I am thankful for the mess to clean after a party because it means I have been surrounded by friends.
The more you praise and celebrate your life, the more there is in life to celebrate.
At a dinner party one should eat wisely but not too well, and talk well but not too wisely.
